author: Odeinoichus
title: Warrior of the Glen?
review:
Set #71021 Unicorn Guy: Our last and final party guest from LEGO Collectible Minifigures Series 18 is one who can't seem to make up their mind, are they a knight, or a unicorn?

Re-using all of the unique elements from Unicorn Girl, Unicorn Guy is a powder baby blue colour with a limited amount of printing on his feet and torso for minor detailing. He has a crown symbol on his chest and some hooves printed on his feet as part of the costume. He carries a pearl gold sword into battle and a printed shield element with a rearing unicorn in a field of vines. Really quite showy actually.

With his winking expression and his colours I'd say this is a very fun Minifigure to own, but I'm still stuck wondering, is he a Unicorn Knight or a Knight posing as a Unicorn for some Masquerade? Overall I'd still recommend him for your collection. Recommended.
